title: Improper validation allows user to unlock Zomato Gold multiple times at the same restaurant within one day

profile.name: Zomato
profile.about: The fastest way to search for great places to eat at and order from around you. Serving 24 countries worldwide.

vulnerability_information:
**Summary:** 
Using this vulnerability, a user can use his account to claim Zomato Gold benefit several times in the same restaurant within one day.  

**Description:** 
Based on Zomato Gold terms and condition, Zomato Gold can be used only once at each partner restaurant in a day. But I think it doesn't work that way.

I have found improper validation in Zomato Android app, on Zomato Gold feature. This vulnerability allows a user to claim Zomato Gold benefit ( 1+1 complementary food or 2+2 complementary drinks) in the same restaurant on a single day. This potentially could be abused by users to share his account to their friends, so they can get the Zomato Gold benefit without subscribing or doing multiple claim in one day. I think this bug potentially bring loss to Zomato if not fixed immediately.

Since I can't take a screenshot of my page while on Visit ID page, I use additional phone to take a picture and video, I hope you still understand.

**Platform(s) Affected:** [website/mobile app]
Android mobile app

## Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Open Zomato Android App (please make sure your account already subscribed to Zomato Gold)
  2. Find a restaurant with Zomato Gold badge or go to Gold Menu on Main Menu
F412873
  3. Click Enjoy your Gold Privilege
F412874
  4. Press the Confirm Unlock button
F412875
  5. Then you will get the Visit ID
F412876
  6. Do the step 2 - 6 again, Here is my second visit on the same restaurant within one day. If you look carefully, the Visit ID and the time is different with the previous one.
F412877

## Supporting Material/References:
Zomato Gold Terms and Conditions, please take a look at point number 3
F412882
https://www.zomato.com/conditions?country_id=94&page_type=SUBSCRIPTION&gold_plan_page=1

## Impact

As I said before, this vulnerability allows one user to claim Zomato Gold benefit several times at one parner restaurant. Lets say after visiting cafe A using Zomato Gold, he lends his account to his friend so his friend could also get the benefit of Zomato Gold without subscribing. He could also use it for himself if he use it for lunch and dinner on the same restaurant.
vulnerability_information_html:
Summary:
Using this vulnerability, a user can use his account to claim Zomato Gold benefit several times in the same restaurant within one day.

Description:
Based on Zomato Gold terms and condition, Zomato Gold can be used only once at each partner restaurant in a day. But I think it doesn't work that way.

I have found improper validation in Zomato Android app, on Zomato Gold feature. This vulnerability allows a user to claim Zomato Gold benefit ( 1+1 complementary food or 2+2 complementary drinks) in the same restaurant on a single day. This potentially could be abused by users to share his account to their friends, so they can get the Zomato Gold benefit without subscribing or doing multiple claim in one day. I think this bug potentially bring loss to Zomato if not fixed immediately.

Since I can't take a screenshot of my page while on Visit ID page, I use additional phone to take a picture and video, I hope you still understand.

Platform(s) Affected: [website/mobile app]
Android mobile app

Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Open Zomato Android App (please make sure your account already subscribed to Zomato Gold)
  2. Find a restaurant with Zomato Gold badge or go to Gold Menu on Main Menu WhatsApp_Image_2019-01-26_at_18.22.31.jpeg (F412873)
  3. Click Enjoy your Gold Privilege WhatsApp_Image_2019-01-26_at_18.43.55.jpeg (F412874)
  4. Press the Confirm Unlock button WhatsApp_Image_2019-01-26_at_18.43.54.jpeg (F412875)
  5. Then you will get the Visit ID WhatsApp_Image_2019-01-26_at_18.43.54_(1).jpeg (F412876)
  6. Do the step 2 - 6 again, Here is my second visit on the same restaurant within one day. If you look carefully, the Visit ID and the time is different with the previous one. WhatsApp_Image_2019-01-26_at_18.43.53.jpeg (F412877)

Supporting Material/References:

Zomato Gold Terms and Conditions, please take a look at point number 3
Screen_Shot_2019-01-26_at_18.52.48.png (F412882)
https://www.zomato.com/conditions?country_id=94&page_type=SUBSCRIPTION&gold_plan_page=1

Impact

As I said before, this vulnerability allows one user to claim Zomato Gold benefit several times at one parner restaurant. Lets say after visiting cafe A using Zomato Gold, he lends his account to his friend so his friend could also get the benefit of Zomato Gold without subscribing. He could also use it for himself if he use it for lunch and dinner on the same restaurant.

activities.markdown_message:
@dertajora - Thanks for your submission :)

Based on your initial description, there do not appear to be any security implications as a direct result of this behavior. If you disagree, please reply with additional information describing your reasoning. Including a working proof-of-concept can be incredibly helpful in our assessment of these claims.

Prateek

activities.message:
Hi @prateek_0490-zomato thanks for your fast reply, so user can claim Zomato Gold benefit several times in a day ? its contradictive with Zomato Gold terms and condition. How if one user in a university class share his account to his classmate? then all the class members don't need to subscribe for Zomato Gold to enjoy the free foods given by Zomato Gold?

According to your terms and condition, "Zomato Gold can be used only once at each partner restaurant in a day" , it means that each user only could use Zomato Gold benefit for one restaurant only one time on one day. Is that correct?

If this bug is not fixed, It will make people not subscribe to Zomato Gold plan and choose to use their friend account.

activities.message: Thanks, @zomato @prateek_0490-zomato for the bounty, I really excited since this is my first bounty from Hackerone! Anyway, I am curious why this bug tagged as low severity? I think this bug is really easy to exploit for Zomato users and could bring a financial loss for Zomato if they abuse it?
activities.markdown_message: Thanks, @zomato @prateek_0490-zomato for the bounty, I really excited since this is my first bounty from Hackerone! Anyway, I am curious why this bug tagged as low severity? I think this bug is really easy to exploit for Zomato users and could bring a financial loss for Zomato if they abuse it?

activities.message:
@dertajora - Abusing it on a larger scale isn't possible because we've restrictions at the backend to detect such abuses and raise an alarm after reaching a set threshold.

Also, it doesn't leaks any sensitive information about users neither it impacts our users, only a small subset of merchants, which can be identified based on the restrictions we have.

I hope this makes sense.

Prateek
activities.markdown_message:

Also, it doesn't leaks any sensitive information about users neither it impacts our users, only a small subset of merchants, which can be identified based on the restrictions we have.

activities.message:
I see, got it @prateek_0490-zomato 

I just wondering, (since this bug is really easy to exploit) how if only 1000 users exploit this bug together and use it 2-3 times in a day (not only 1 user that exploit this that would raise your alarm), I think it would multiply the cost you need to pay to partner restaurant and it would seem as organic transaction.

Based on that, I think this bug maybe qualified for Google Play Security Rewards, but since they don't accept Low severity bug I can't submit it there.  So I would like to request severity escalation from you if its possible.

Whether you can increase it or not, I still appreciate you and @zomato  for the fast response and all of the explanation.

@dertajora - This bug anyways doesn't qualifies for the Google Play Security Rewards because this was on API.

Prateek
